about.label: About
about.bio1: A father, a family man, and a drummer at heart. My
about.bio1rest: for music started at age six, when I found myself drumming non-stop, and already then I knew music would be an inseparable part of my life.
about.bio2rest: at age 17, but only in 2019 did I buy my first instrument — and from the moment the first notes met my fingers, a deep love story began.
about.bio3: Since then, I've been performing, teaching, leading workshops, and accompanying events through the unique sound of the handpan — an instrument that combines delicacy, depth, meditativeness, and rare accessibility. I believe we all deserve a space for listening, calm,

items.title: Live Events & Performances
items.subtitle: Sounds that stop time. An atmosphere that touches the soul.
items.description: Live music that elevates every event and makes it unforgettable. The handpan sounds create a unique frequency of calm, celebration, and magic.
details: Creates a luxurious and moving atmosphere

items.title: Couples Handpan Workshop
items.subtitle: Connection through sound. Love through music.
items.description: An intimate and moving workshop where you'll discover music's ability to open the heart.

items.title: Family Workshop
items.subtitle: A moment of connection. A sound of love.
items.description: An opportunity to stop the race and breathe together. We'll create a safe space where everyone can express themselves.

items.title: Team Workshop
items.subtitle: Inspiration, listening, and shared growth
items.description: A musical experience that connects people. Together we create shared harmony.

recommendations.label: Testimonials
recommendations.title: What people
recommendations.subtitle: Some of the kind words I've received from students and participants

items.name: Dolev George
items.text: Bro, thank you for a lesson beyond expectations! The personal attention, professionalism, full care and the match between exercises and playing level turned it from a lesson into a real experience.

items.name: Tal Shrizli
items.text: A lesson with you is truly a celebration for the heart, ear, and soul. The way you teach music is simply fun, attentive, and professional. You really make people want to learn more.

items.name: Talia Toker
items.text: Beautiful soul! The last session really opened me up! I sat for hours in a row and flew with myself. Getting more and more free and it's a great joy and huge thanks.

items.name: Another Student
items.text: The experience is magical and the atmosphere Daniel creates is simply addictive. Daniel is an incredibly gifted teacher who knows exactly how to approach and open the world of handpan to everyone.
